Html:
There have been a lot of changes and fixes recently to the project. In particular Open Office generated excel binary files should now work. I would like to propose that we create a new release for download (called 2.1 beta ?).

This will then make it more obvious to people discovering the project that things are now happening and also make it less likely that they download the (now quite old) 2.0.1.0 release and end up raises the same bugs that have been fixed.

It also gives us an opportunity to get a wider variety of files tested in the field to make sure that the open office piece is working acceptably.

Thoughts?

Ian

I agree. You've been hacking through this stuff and I think I've barely contributed anything.

What would you like me to do?

Well, as we seem to be the only 2 active devs on this project, I'll take that as unanimous ;-)

Re - what can you do to help more. I would say cherry pick stuff from the issue list or some of the submitted patches. If you have a way of generating non business sensitive SQL Server reporting reports that would be really useful to test if they work, as I have no SSRS generated files to test with (I have made a change that should help but it definitely needs a thorough unit test).

Ok, I created the release.
